## main() function

CLI application main entry point

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function main(argv?: string[]): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  argv | string\[\] | Optional command-line arguments. Defaults to <code>process.argv</code>. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
